mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET user_id = #{user_id} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, textColor = #{textColor}, color = #{color} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into diary(user_id, no, title, content, textColor, color, reg_date) values(#{user_id}, diary_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{textColor}, #{color}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE FROM( SELECT USER_ID, NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, ROWNUM "RN" FROM DIARY WHERE REG_DATE LIKE sysdate - 365 ) WHERE RN = 1

SELECT title, reg_date "start", reg_date + 1/24 "end", textColor, color, concat('/diary/readView?no=', to_char(no)) "url" FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND reg_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
